title: Delete RACING GAME-released-on-gaming-platform Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor
I want to be able to disconnect GAMING PLATFORMS from RACING GAMES
So I can clean up bad data or test data
description:
* The ›released-on-gaming-platform‹ relationship is deleted when it actually exists. -> Status Code \`204\`
* A successful request returns with an empty body.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* Requests are rejected when there exists no ›released-on-gaming-platform‹ relationship between the provided nodes. -> Status Code \`404\`
